DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer ( NSCLC ) patient clinical profile outcome treatment Gefitinib Pulmonary Oncology Outpatient Clinic Dr. Soetomo General Hospital , Surabaya , Indonesia .
DOC.brief_title: The Evaluation Lung Cancer Patient Treated With Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor Tyrosine Kinase
DOC.detailed_description: Primary Objective : To determine efficacy Gefitinib NSCLC patient harbor positive EGFR mutation . Secondary Objective : To evaluate subjective response NSCLC patient harbor positive EGFR mutation treat Gefitinib . Safety Objective : To evaluate safety tolerability Gefitinib NSCLC patient harbor positive EGFR mutation .
DOC.criteria: NSCLC base histopathologic examination Adenocarcinoma and/or nonadenocarcinoma base histology examination Clinical stadium stage IIIB IV Age 1670 year old Received gefitinib therapy At least complete 2 ( two ) data set RECIST 1.1 evaluation study period January 2013 July 2015 Missing data variable treatment outcomes medical record
